price: Kuma ku yãƙi waɗanda* suke yãƙinku, a cikin hanyar Allah, kuma kada ku yi tsõkana, lalle ne Allah bã Ya son mãsu tsõkana.
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡتَدُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدِينَ
footnotes: * An umurci Musulmi da tsare kansu da yãƙi ga duk wanda ya yãƙe su, a kõ'ina yake. Sai dai an hana su tsõkanar wasu, kuma an hana su su yi yãƙi a cikin Hurumin Makka sai fa idan an fãɗa su da yãƙi a cikinsa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqātilū fī sabīli al-lahi alladhīna yuqātilūnakum walā taʿtadū inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-muʿ'tadīna
